message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I believe this split reflects the urgency for me to secure a fair deal due to inflation.
Your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's find a more equitable arrangement.
I understand your point about fairness, but the decreasing value of the money significantly impacts me. I'm proposing a compromise for a mutually beneficial outcome.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. We both lose if this drags on.  I'm offering a near-even split to end this fairly.  Take it or leave it.
